page.title: 11Inverarity Community Groups
page.content:
The Tuesday Club. The Tuesday Club is held on a Tuesday afternoon in the local church hall.The people who attend it,play cards,chess and dominoes.It provides oppertunities for them to talk to one another.The people who attend are mainly elderly.
The Young Wives Group. The wives group was formed in 1974 by Mrs.E.Todd and it has about twelve members.The activities of the group include films,talks,demonstrations and visits to places of interest.The group meet every month in the local church
